public class HomomorphicRsaController

      • encryptHomomorphicRsa

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="api/v1/EncryptHomomorphicRsa",
                method=POST)
public Response encryptHomomorphicRsa(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                           java.math.BigInteger valueOne,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                           java.math.BigInteger valueTwo)
        Encrypts data with Homomorphic Encryption Technique
        Parameters:
        valueOne - First User Input that has to be encrypted
        valueTwo - - Second User Input that has to be encrypted
        Returns:
        Response object with response data that contains ID of encrypted record stored in the cloud, status and exceptions if any

      • decryptHomomorphicRsa

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="api/v1/DecryptHomomorphicRsa",
                method=POST)
public Response decryptHomomorphicRsa(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                           int id)
        Decrypts data with Homomorphic Encryption Technique, that was encrypted with the same technique
        Parameters:
        id - The ID that was returned during encryption - This indicates the record identifier of encrypted data stored in the cloud DB
        Returns:
        Response object with response data, status and exceptions if any
